message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9000?
I understand that $12000 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $11000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $11000 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9500?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $11000, but I'm willing to compromise a bit more. How about we meet at $10800?
I'm getting close to your last offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $10200?
